name: azoom-hr-management
description: An application to receive and process image (crop, compress, resize)
author: Azoom

scripts.deploy:delete-staging-tag: git fetch --tags && git push origin --delete $(git tag -l 'staging-*') || true && git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*'
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn deploy:delete-staging-tag && TAG=`echo staging-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
